altTitles.ja: 一生好きってゆったじゃん

description.en:
A collection of one-shots by Yokoyari Mengo.

- Chapter 1. **Hagane no Kokoro**
- Chapter 2. **Neo Dutch Wife**
- Chapter 3. **Stand By You**
- Chapter 4. **"Kawaii"**
Meet Yukiho Amamiya, a 14-year-old girl who becomes a gravure idol to help her sister. She's cute, and she knows it - but she can't seem to be cute around the boy she likes. Will she ever hear him call her "cute"?  
- Chapter 5. **One Flower  (Ipponbana)**
- Chapter 6. **Koi wa Zenkei Shisei**
- Chapter 7. **Namu Amidaisuki**
description.es:
4. "Kawaii"
“Solo soy linda”, se repite a sí Yukiho Amamiya, una chica de 14 años cuyas circunstancias familiares le han obligado a entrar en la industria del modelaje, y que no tiene nada más que su “lindura”. De la famosa mangaka, Mengo Yokoyari, autora de “Kuzu no Honkai” y “Retort Pounch!”, llega este Oneshot protagonizado por la desilusión y el arrepentimiento. ¿Qué pasaría si, en realidad, no tuvieras ni aquello que tanto aclamabas poseer y cuyo sentimiento era lo que te hacía seguir adelante…? Si no te tuvieras ni a ti mismo…

biography.en:
Mengo Yokoyari dropped out of high school to become a mangaka assistant. She wanted to become a manga artist since she was little.

Yokoyari made her debut in 2009 with Maken☆H Zemi!, which was published in Magazine WOoooo! and later collected as part of the Mokkai Shiyo? compilation.

After contributing regularly to the magazine, she was invited by a Futabasha editor to draw a series for one its magazines. It would materialize as Haruwaka, Yokoyari's first serialization work.

She married someone from outside the manga industry on February 22, 2019.
